item.title: Terms
item.dc:creator: group8
item.content:encoded:
Terms of Service for HyperVision

Welcome to HyperVision! These terms of service ("Terms") govern your use of our virtual reality and augmented reality products, services, and website. By accessing or using our Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please refrain from using our Services.

  1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using our Services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to abide by these Terms in their entirety, including any additional guidelines or rules provided by HyperVision.
  2. Use of Services a. Eligibility: You must be at least 14 years old or have the consent of a parent or legal guardian to use our Services. If you are accessing our Services on behalf of an organization, you represent and warrant that you have the authority to bind that organization to these Terms.
    b. Account Registration: In order to access certain features of our Services, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
    c. Prohibited Use: You agree not to use our Services for any illegal, unauthorized, or prohibited activities. This includes but is not limited to infringing upon intellectual property rights, distributing malicious software, or engaging in any form of harassment or abuse.
  3. Intellectual Property a. Ownership: HyperVision retains all rights, title, and interest in and to the Services, including all intellectual property rights. You agree not to modify, copy, distribute, or create derivative works based on our Services without our prior written consent.
    b. User Content: By submitting or uploading any content to our Services, you grant HyperVision a worldwide, royalty-free, non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, and display such content solely for the purpose of providing and improving the Services.
  4. Privacy HyperVision respects your privacy and handles your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using our Services, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your information as described in the Privacy Policy.
  5. Disclaimer of Liability a. Use at Your Own Risk: You acknowledge that the use of virtual reality and augmented reality technologies involves certain risks. HyperVision shall not be held liable for any injuries, damages, or losses resulting from the use of our Services.
    b. Third-Party Content and Links: Our Services may include links to third-party websites or content. HyperVision is not responsible for the accuracy, legality, or appropriateness of such content. Your use of third-party content or websites is at your own risk.
  6. Termination HyperVision reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access to the Services at any time and for any reason without prior notice. You may also terminate your use of the Services by discontinuing your access.
  7. Modifications to the Terms HyperVision may update or modify these Terms from time to time. Any changes will be effective upon posting the updated Terms on our website. Your continued use of the Services after the changes will signify your acceptance of the modified Terms.
  8. Governing Law and Jurisdiction These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Greek Government. Any disputes arising out of or relating to these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Greece.

item.title: Privacy
item.dc:creator: group8
item.content:encoded:
Privacy Policy of HyperVision

Effective Date: 10/1/23

At HyperVision, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the information you provide to us when using our virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) products, services, and website.

  1. Information Collection:

1.1 Personal Information: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, contact details, and payment information when you interact with our products, services, or website. This information is necessary to provide you with a personalized and enhanced user experience.

1.2 Usage Information: We may collect non-personal information about your interactions with our products and services, including data about your device, IP address, browser type, usage patterns, and referring website. This information helps us improve our offerings and tailor them to better meet your needs.

  1. Use of Information:

2.1 Personal Information: We use your personal information to provide, maintain, and improve our VR and AR products and services. This includes order processing, product delivery, customer support, and communication regarding updates or changes to our offerings.

2.2 Usage Information: Non-personal information is used to analyze trends, gather demographic information, monitor the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns, and enhance the overall user experience.

  1. Information Sharing:

3.1 Service Providers: We may engage third-party service providers to assist us in delivering our products and services. These providers are contractually bound to handle your information securely and only for the purposes specified by HyperVision.

3.2 Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required to comply with applicable laws, regulations, legal processes, or government requests. We will also share information to protect the rights, property, or safety of HyperVision, our users, or others.

3.3 Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of our company assets, customer information may be transferred or acquired as part of the transaction. We will notify you via email or prominent notice on our website of any such change in ownership or control of your personal information.

  1. Data Security:

We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

  1. Your Choices:

You have the right to access, update, and delete your personal information. You may also choose to opt out of receiving promotional communications from us. Please contact us using the information provided at the end of this policy to exercise your rights or update your preferences.

  1. Third-Party Links:

Our products and services may contain links to third-party websites or applications. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third-party sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of those sites before providing any personal information.

  1. Children's Privacy:

Our products and services are not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from individuals under 13 years of age. If we become aware of any such data, we will take immediate steps to delete it.

  1. Changes to this Privacy Policy:

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the revised policy on our website or by other means of communication. We encourage you to review the Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your privacy.

  1. Contact Us:

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

HyperVision Company Address: Dionis, Arta 47100
Email: hypervisionstaff@gmail.com

We appreciate your trust in HyperVision and are committed to safeguarding your privacy while delivering exceptional VR and AR experiences.

Features

Discover a new sence

Social Media

Facebook, Instagram, Messenger, Youtube, Snapchat, Twitter, TikTok, Spotify.

HyperVision Hub

Welcome to our online hub, a digital haven where connections thrive and possibilities are limitless.

Games

BeatSaber, Superhot, Tetris, Job Simulator, Grand Turismo, No Man's Sky.

Virtual School

Discover Virtual School your gateway to a revolutionary online learning experience. Access high-quality education from the comfort of home.

The Sol Key

Are you eager to embark on a musical journey? Look no further! Virtual Music Learner is here to revolutionize your musical education.

Virtual Workshop

VirtualWorkshop, an innovative platform that brings immersive learning experiences right to your fingertips.Unlock your potential and acquire new skills.

New Features coming soon

Features and benefits

Transcend your sences!

Discover new posibilities, master epic challenges or revisit classic moments in your favorite games.

Sign Up
Learn More

Entertainment and Gaming

VR provides an unparalleled level of immersion in gaming and entertainment experiences, allowing users to step into virtual worlds, interact with characters and objects, and participate in thrilling adventures.

Training and Simulation

VR offers a safe and cost-effective platform for training and simulation, allowing users to practice real-world scenarios in a controlled virtual environment, such as flight simulation, medical training, or industrial simulations.

Therapeutic and Rehabilitation Applications

VR has shown promise in therapeutic and rehabilitation settings, helping individuals with phobias, PTSD, or physical disabilities through exposure therapy and interactive rehabilitation exercises.

Real-world Overlay

AR overlays digital information onto the real world, enhancing the user's perception and understanding of their environment.

Enhanced Visualization

AR enables users to visualize and comprehend complex data, models, or structures by overlaying virtual elements onto physical objects, enhancing understanding and decision-making.

SALE

Limited time only

Ready to launch your dreams into reality?

Straight forward and up front pricing plans designed to suit anyone.

HyperView VR

  • Monthly In Game Rewards
  • HyperView Merch Bundle
  • Further Account Customization
Choose VR & AR

HyperView AR

Starter Set

500€

Save 22% 650€

  • AR Glasses
  • Charger
  • Charging Cable
  • Glasses Case
  • Cleaning Set
  • Starter Apps
Choose AR

100% no-risk money back guarantee

Testimonials

What people are saying

Don't just take our word for it, hear what members of our community have to say about us

The HyperView VR set has completely changed my gaming experience. The level of immersion and realism is mind-blowing. I feel like I'm actually inside the game, interacting with the virtual world. It's a whole new level of entertainment!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Sarah Williams

The HyperView AR glasses have transformed the way I shop. With AR apps, I can try on clothes virtually, see how furniture looks in my home before buying it, and even test makeup products without actually applying them. It's a game-changer for online shopping!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Fanus Dermet

I've used the HyperView VR set for educational purposes, and it's been incredible. I can explore historical landmarks, dive into the depths of the ocean, or even visit outer space, all from the comfort of my home. It's an amazing tool for learning and exploration.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Sophie Kim

The HyperView VR set has revolutionized the way I exercise. With VR fitness games, workouts have become incredibly fun and engaging. I forget I'm actually exercising because I'm so engrossed in the virtual environment. It's a fantastic way to stay active and motivated.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

David Rock

I've used the HyperView AR glasses for navigation, and it's incredibly helpful. Instead of constantly looking at my phone for directions, I can simply follow virtual arrows overlaid on the real world. It's convenient and makes navigating unfamiliar places much easier.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Aiden Pate

The HyperView AR glasses have enhanced my museum visits. With AR-guided tours, I can see 3D models, historical context, and interactive information overlaid on the exhibits. It adds a whole new layer of depth and engagement to the museum experience.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Nia Jackson

I am in love this product, it has completely transformed our business. Thanks guys, keep up the great work!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Brennan Huff

The HyperVision products have unlocked a whole new world of immersive experiences, where I can explore, learn, and play like never before. The level of realism and interactivity is mind-blowing, making every moment truly unforgettable. These technologies have truly changed the way I perceive and interact with the world around me.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Olie Sykes

FAQs

  • What is HyperVision?

    HyperVision uses virsual and augmented reality to help people to learn and practice new skills. The app will provide one safe and believable virtual world where users will be able to interact with objects and information while learning new skills. In this way, the company will offer an innovative solution for the training and development of the skills of its users.
  • Do you need a account?

    Yes you will need a HyperVision account. You can make one in the HyperVision site.
  • Where is the app for the HyperView VR and the HyperView AR?

    There is an for the HyperView VR and the HyperView AR called 'Vision' which allows you to access a number of functions and is available for free in Apple/Google stores.
  • Can I use any HyperVision product Outdoor or Outside the House?

    You only can use the HyperView AR. With the HyperView VR is not recommended since the direct sunlight can damage the lenses and affect the sensors. You can refer to the manual that comes with it.
  • Where can I get help?

    You can go to the bottom of the site in the category Company and click the Contact for assistance. Make sure you are ready with information such as orders, accounts, devices etc.
  • Are the HyperView VR and the HyperView AR the same thing?

    Yes, but the main diffrence is the HyperView VR & HyperView AR uses sofware based on their requirements.
  • Do you ned a PC for the HyperView VR and the HyperView AR?

    No there are standalone devices.
  • What else can you do with the HyperView VR and the HyperView AR?

    The HyperView VR and the HyperView AR are primarily virtual reality devices, although they can do more. For example, you can use them to view movies or concerts, interact with friends socially, or even hold virtual work meetings and training sessions.
  • I have eyesight problems and wear glasses. Can I enjoy the HyperView VR?

    Of course. When you buy the HyperView VR, it comes together with the glasses spacer that can help you wear your spectacles while using the headset. Besides, you can also consider in buying prescription lenses for greater viewing.
  • Can my kids use HyperVision products?

    It is not recommended for kids or children below 13 years old. Devices are designed for ages 13 years and above. The reason is that the younger kids have greater risk of getting injured and experience adverse affects when using them.

item.title: Καλημέρα κόσμε!
item.dc:creator: group8
item.content:encoded: Καλωσορίσατε στο WordPress! Αυτό είναι το πρώτο σας άρθρο. Αλλάξτε το ή διαγράψτε το και αρχίστε να γράφετε!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Γεια σας, αυτό είναι ένα σχόλιο. Για να ξεκινήσετε με την έγκριση, επεξεργασία και διαγραφή σχολίων, παρακαλώ επισκεφθείτε την οθόνη Σχόλια στον Πίνακα Ελέγχου. Τα άβαταρ των σχολιαστών προέρχονται από το Gravatar.

item.title: Refund and Returns Policy
item.dc:creator: group8
item.content:encoded:
Overview

Our refund and returns policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have passed since your purchase, we can’t offer you a full refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned. We also do not accept products that are intimate or sanitary goods, hazardous materials, or flammable liquids or gases.

Additional non-returnable items:

  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete your return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted:

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds

Once your return is received and inspected, we will send you an email to notify you that we have received your returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund.

If you are approved, then your refund will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to your credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds

If you haven’t received a refund yet, first check your bank account again.

Then contact your credit card company, it may take some time before your refund is officially posted.

Next contact your bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted.

If you’ve done all of this and you still have not received your refund yet, please contact us at {email address}.

Sale items

Only regular priced items may be refunded. Sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If you need to exchange it for the same item, send us an email at {email address} and send your item to: {physical address}.

Gifts

If the item was marked as a gift when purchased and shipped directly to you, you’ll receive a gift credit for the value of your return. Once the returned item is received, a gift certificate will be mailed to you.

If the item wasn’t marked as a gift when purchased, or the gift giver had the order shipped to themselves to give to you later, we will send a refund to the gift giver and they will find out about your return.

Shipping returns

To return your product, you should mail your product to: {physical address}.

You will be responsible for paying for your own shipping costs for returning your item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If you receive a refund, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from your refund.

Depending on where you live, the time it may take for your exchanged product to reach you may vary.

If you are returning more expensive items, you may consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We don’t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.

Need help?

Contact us at {email} for questions related to refunds and returns.

item.title: HyperView VR
item.dc:creator: group8
item.content:encoded: Step into the extraordinary with HyperView VR. This cutting-edge virtual reality product takes you on an immersive journey like never before. With breathtaking visuals, seamless motion tracking, and intuitive controls, HyperView VR transports you to stunning virtual worlds that feel astonishingly real. Whether you're exploring fantastical realms, engaging in thrilling gameplay, or experiencing immersive educational content, HyperView VR delivers an unparalleled level of immersion. Get ready to redefine reality and embark on unforgettable adventures with HyperView VR at your fingertips.

item.title: HyperView AR
item.dc:creator: group8
item.content:encoded: Experience a new reality with HyperView AR. This cutting-edge augmented reality product merges the digital and physical worlds seamlessly, opening up a world of interactive and immersive experiences. With its sleek design and precise tracking, HyperView AR delivers stunning visuals and empowers you to explore endless possibilities. Step into augmented reality and let your surroundings come to life with HyperView AR.
item.excerpt:encoded: The most fashionably sleek AR wearable on display

item.title: HyperView VR & AR
item.dc:creator: group8
item.content:encoded: Introducing HyperView VR and HyperView AR, the ultimate duo of virtual and augmented reality experiences. With HyperView VR, immerse yourself in breathtaking virtual worlds, while HyperView AR seamlessly blends digital overlays with the real world. This groundbreaking combination delivers a transformative and versatile reality-altering experience like never before.
item.excerpt:encoded: Experience the best of both worlds with HyperView VR and HyperView AR.
